app-error-500.title: Something went wrong
app-error-500.message: There was an error processing your request. Try reloading!

app-error-404.title: Not Found
app-error-404.message: The page you are looking for might have been removed had its name changed or is temporarily unavailable.

app-error-403.title: Forbidden
app-error-403.message: You don't have permission to access on this page!
